Rautoml 1.0.0.0
  • Reference

    Bar Plot Function

    custom_barplot.Rd

    Generates a bar plot with various customization options.

    custom_barplot(
  df,
  xvar,
  yvar = NULL,
  vertical = TRUE,
  stackedtype = TRUE,
  colorVar = NULL,
  bar_width = 0.9,
  default_col = "blue",
  plot_title = NULL,
  xlab = NULL,
  ylab = "Percentage",
  title_pos = 0.5,
  title_size = 25,
  axis_title_size = 20,
  axis_text_size = 16,
  data_label_size = 10,
  axistext_angle = 0,
  legend_title = "",
  colorbrewer = "Dark2"
)

    Arguments

    df

    A data frame containing the data to be plotted.

    xvar

    The categorical variable for the x-axis.

    yvar

    The numerical variable for the y-axis (optional).

    vertical

    Logical; whether the bars should be vertical (default: TRUE).

    stackedtype

    Logical; whether the bars should be stacked (default: TRUE).

    colorVar

    A categorical variable for coloring bars (optional).

    bar_width

    Width of the bars (default: 0.9).

    default_col

    Default fill color if colorVar is not provided (default: "blue").

    plot_title

    Title of the plot (optional).

    xlab

    Label for the x-axis (optional).

    ylab

    Label for the y-axis (default: "Percentage").

    title_pos

    Positioning of the title (default: 0.5).

    title_size

    Size of the title text (default: 25).

    axis_title_size

    Size of the axis titles (default: 20).

    axis_text_size

    Size of the axis text (default: 16).

    data_label_size

    Size of the data labels (default: 10).

    axistext_angle

    Angle of x-axis text labels (default: 0).

    legend_title

    Title of the legend (default: "").

    colorbrewer

    Color palette from RColorBrewer (default: "Dark2").

    Value

    A ggplot2 bar plot object.
